snippet: A New York court has ruled that a Long Island father used reasonable force when he spanked his 8-year-old son for cursing at an adult....

headline.print_headline: New York Court: Spanking Was Not Excessive
headline.main: New York Court: Spanking Was Not Excessive

lead_paragraph: A New York court has ruled that a Long Island father used reasonable force when he spanked his 8-year-old son for cursing at an adult.
